alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 19 at 1:30PM MDT until April 21 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MDT THURSDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO 10 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Grand Valley and Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin. In Utah, Southeast Utah and Arches/Grand Flat. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 10 AM MDT Thursday. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight Thursday night to 10 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley
